content: needle from the rs while working raglan increases on every other round as follows row 9 was with increases so the next one is round 1 knit across round 2 * knit to marker m1r knit raglan stitch m1l * work from * to * a total of 4 times while working the stitches into lace pattern on the front knit to end of round 8 sts have been increased work rounds 1 and 2 20 23 24 25 27 times there are now a total of 301 329 341 353 377 sts on the needle distribution of sts 42 46 48 49 53 sts right back 1 raglan st 64 70 72 76 80 right sleeve 1 raglan sts 85 93 97 99 107 sts front 1 raglan st 64 70 72 76 80 sts left sleeve 1 raglan sts 42 46 48 49 53 sts left back the total number of sts for the sleeves has now been achieved so now increases are worked only on the body as follows round 1 * knit to marker m1r knit raglan stitch knit to marker knit raglan stitch m1l * work from * to * a total of 2 times while working the stitches into lace pattern on the sleeves knit to end of round 4 sts have been increased round 2 knit across work rounds 1 and 2 a total of 2 3 5 6 6 times there are now a total of 309 341 361 377 401 sts on the needles the yoke has now been completed distribution of sts 44 49 53 55 59 sts right back 1 raglan st 64 70 72 76 80 sts right sleeve 1 raglan st 89 99 107 111 119 sts front 1 raglan st 64 70 72 76 80 sts left sleeve 1 raglan st 44 49 53 55 59 sts left back the yoke/raglan line measures after the neckband approx 20 21 22 24 26 cm but it depends on the yarn/gauge you use page 6 of 9 body divide the stitches for body and sleeves while casting on new stitches at the underarms remove the raglan markers at the same time work as follows knit 44 49 53 55 59 sts k1 raglan st place the next 64 70 72 76 80 sts on a stitch holder right sleeve cast on 6 8 10 12 12 new sts for the underarm using the backward loop method k1 raglan st knit 89 99 107 111 119 sts front k1 raglan st place the next 64 70 72 76 80 sts on a stitch holder left sleeve cast on 6 8 10 12 12 new sts for the underarm using the backward loop method k1 raglan st knit 44 49 53 55 59 sts left back there are now a total of 193 217 237 249 265 sts on the needle for the body work in the round in stockinette stitch until the sweater measures between 40-50 cm 15 7-19
